{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2505.03218v1", "title": "A Characterization of Metaplectic Time-Frequency Representations", "summary": "We characterize all time-frequency representations that satisfy a general
covariance property: any weak*-continuous bilinear mapping that intertwines
time-frequency shifts on the configuration space with time-frequency shifts on
phase space is a multiple of a metaplectic time-frequency representation.", "main_category": "math.FA", "categories": "math.FA", "published": "2025-05-06T06:18:42Z"}
